author: Imani Moise
title: Samsung, Biogen Reach Deal With AbbVie to Sell Near Copy of Humira
text:
Samsung Bioepis Co. said Thursday it has reached a settlement with AbbVie Inc. that will allow it to market a near-replica version of one of the worldâ€™s top-selling drugs Humira.
Under the terms of the agreement, AbbVie will grant Samsung and its partner Biogen Inc. a nonexclusive license that allows the companies to sell their biosimilar version of the rheumatoid-arthritis treatment under the name Imraldi. AbbVie will also collect royalties from the companies once the product is launched.
